fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Looking at the overall EU policies and topics the following picture presents itself for the magnesite Producers: 
 
1)    All EU policies and legislative initiatives of relevance to the magnesite producers 
 
2)    EU Raw materials Policy 
 
a)    Working group on Criticality 
b)    Working group on  Mineral Policy, Land-planning and Permitting 
 
3)    Trade Policy 
 
a)    EU general Trade policies that would impact on the magnesite producers 
b)    China’s recognition as market economy at WTO 
c)    Anti-dumping regulations 
d)    Anti-subsidy regulations 
e)    Smuggling 
 
4)    Environmental policy 
a)    IED Directive 
i.    General BREFs 
ii.    BREF on cement, Lime, Magnesia 
iii.    BREF on Large Volume inorganic Chemicals 
 
b)    Air 
c)    Water 
d)    Waste 
i.    BAT on Mine Waste 
e)    Natura 2000 
 
5)    Health and Safety 
 
a)    Chemical Agents Directive: NO2/NO, CO 
b)    Carcinogens Directive 
c)    Physical Agents 
d)    EU H & S Refit: revision of all directives 
 
6)    Energy and Climate change policy 
 
a)    EU Energy Policy – access to competitively priced energy 
b)    ETS review 
c)    Carbon Leakage list review 
d)    Access to competitive energy 
 
 
 
 
 
7)    Feed Minerals issues 
 
a)    EFSA (European Feed Safety Administration) 
b)    Autorization feed additives 
c)    Feed catalogue 
d)    CEN (European Committee of standarization) 
e)    CLP (Classification, Labelling and Packaging)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Extracción, tratamiento, producción y comercialización de 
magnesita caústica y sus productos derivados 
Nuestro producto es principalmente utilizado en los mercados de la alimentación animal y fertilizantes
